ygData.subject: Re: CAMPING
ygData.msgSnippet: Well you know it WOULD be great for that whole new continent.. but that is not going to be around till the expansion comes out.. which is around xmas time i
ygData.messageBody:
Well you know it WOULD be great for that whole new continent.. but that is
not going to be around till the expansion comes out.. which is around xmas
time i believe ... so until then eq will sell more copies games gets more
crowded and we all just sit around and wait

On Tue, 1 Jun 1999, Zwanenburg, John wrote:

> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
> Hey,
>
> kelly, You know that verant IS adding new zones dont you? Yeah they are
> making a whole new island south of faydwer area...the new race of lizardmen
> are going to be on that continent. So thats a bonus, Plus ive read that
> verant is also adding about 16-20 new zones on the existing world...im not
> sure where but thats what is going to happen, lets just hope they arent
> newbie areas =)
> John Zwanenburg
> Tips Support/Support Sipt
> Tel: (613) 998-2745
>
> > ----------
> > From: Kelly Pruett[SMTP:pruett@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 9:57 AM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] CAMPING
> >
> > From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
> >
> > Is it just me or do we need more areas in the game ... a couple of new
> > zones
> > wouldn't hurt. It MIGHT help with camping but then again ... it might not.
> > I was
> > in Befallen the other night and I swear I couldn't see a single skelton
> > for the
> > first floor and a half. (If you've never been there it's like wall to wall
> > skeletons.)
> >
> > Anyway, I hear you brother .... hopefully someone at Verant will notice
> > and
> > attempt to fix the situation in some way. Something like a high level mob
> > spawn
> > on top of a camping group would suit me just fine. :)
> >
> > -Faderic
> >
> >
> > "Mifsud, Michael" wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> > >
> > > Hmmm I am really starting to hate campers.
> > >
> > > I use to take camping with a grain of salt and just move on. This is
> > now
> > > becoming IMPOSSIBLE for me at my level to do. Let me recite a little
> > story.
> > >
> > > I login on Saturday starting out in lake rathe, camped. Not to fussed
> > since
> > > I can not pull the aviaks anyway, only CASTERS can. Whats up with that?
> > >
> > > I moved on to the Egret Aviaks, CAMPED. hmmm no problem lets try HH,
> > both
> > > ends camped. sigh, oh well im near Neriak I can head home to stock up
> > and
> > > try out lesser faydark and Mistmoore. On the boat I get, I arrive in
> > > Mistmoore for the first time, thought the place was pretty cool.
> > Learned
> > > the easier areas pretty quick and start pulling for my group.
> > >
> > > Wow this is going pretty well. Hmmm zone went from 2 groups to 5
> > groups.
> > > One group SIITING on the gargoyle spawn, another group hogging THE whole
> > > graveyard, and the third, this is the best, the third camping the
> > CORRIDOR
> > > between the easy side of Mistmoore to the hard side of Mistmoore. I
> > mean
> > > C'MON. Thats just RUDE. Everytime we tried to pull some tuffer mobs
> > > through the corridor their mages pets went berserk and they effectively
> > took
> > > all the kills.
> > >
> > > SIGH
> > >
> > > I remember when lake rathe was empty. I remember when HH was empty. Is
> > it
> > > just because most people on the server are my level ?
> > >
> > > People just DONT understand that a spawn can only support SO many
> > groups.
> > > Oh, a word of warning, NEVER take a caster to the Aviaks In Lake Rathe,
> > they
> > > wont leave. I know a few of my friends who I didn't see until they made
> > > level 25. They just would not leave that easy xp area. I hate it.
> > >
> > > ARGH!
> > >
> > > ahhh I feel much better now, thanks for listening.
> > >
> > > I will be starting a new character on MM just to see if its a little
> > better
> > > WAY behind the pack. Lets hope it is.
> > >
> > > ------------------------------------------------------------------------

> > > They both have communities at ONElist. Find yours today!
> > > ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> > > For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
> >
